pullRequest.title: Regenerate checkpoint states on demand
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Reduce memory requirements during non-finalised periods by limiting the number of checkpoint states that are held and regenerating them on demand.
Fixed Issue(s)
fixes #2292
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Don't store checkpoint states, regenerate on demand.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into drop-checkpoint-states
Add comments that checkpoint state columns are only for backwards compatibility. Delete a little more dead code.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into drop-checkpoint-states
